source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.
source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts

items.title: Brew Real Beer

visible_instructors.job_title: PhD, husband, father and life-long learner
visible_instructors.name: Ted
visible_instructors.title: Ted Esler

items.headline: Brewing 101: Make real beer using grains, malts, and yeasts. A beginner's course in partial mash brewing.
objectives_summary: Over an hour and a half of video content including theory and demonstration
By the end of this course you will know (and observe) the process of home brewing
Understand what equipment is necessary to brew beer at home

items.title: The Secret to Your Painting's Success
items.headline: How Making a Great Start to Your Painting Ensures Successful Completion
objectives_summary: Research, prepare and begin a painting

items.title: Acrylic Art Painting Techniques BASICS
items.headline: Learn to paint with acrylics - BEGINNERS
objectives_summary: Understand various techniques, mediums and be able to create archival artwork.

items.title: 7 Steps to Gothic Calligraphy
items.headline: 7 steps to your first masterpiece
objectives_summary: What is Gothic, how and when it was founded?
How to write Gothic calligraphy and what tools to use?
What size of letters in Modern Calligraphy?

items.title: Wagara Decorative Painting for Beginners

visible_instructors.job_title: Wagara Decorative Painter/和柄トールペイント講師
visible_instructors.name: Michiko
visible_instructors.title: Michiko Ozawa

items.headline: Wagara is Japanese classic patterns.  I teach you my original technique to make WAGARA decorative painting.
objectives_summary: Course goal is to get the impression of WAGARA decorative painting.
You will learn how to make WAGARA Decorative painting.

items.title: Learn To Sew
items.headline: Start your sewing journey with our clear and simple Learn To Sew course.
objectives_summary: How to operate a sewing machine
Basic sewing skills
Basic sewing machine maintenance

items.title: Art for Beginners: Drawing & Watercolor Painting for FUN
items.headline: Create 6 Step-By-Step Drawing & Watercolor Painting Projects! Designed Especially for Beginner Artists of All Ages.
objectives_summary: Create 6 cute and fun watercolor paintings.
Participate in an activity that cultivates critical thinking skills, develops hand-eye coordination, and encourages self-expression.
Apply the knowledge gained in this course to create unique masterpieces.

items.title: Watercolour Paint Tips
items.headline: Cost saving tips for Watercolour Paint Tubes, Watch a Demo and Make your own ART Journal
objectives_summary: Learn 'how' to stretch paint pigments,  a little further just by organizing and opening up tubes!
Watch 'how' to do a quick painting of tropical birds using paint from dried up tubes.
As a BONUS lecture, students will learn 'how' to make their own ART Journal

items.title: Watercolor realistic orchid painting: step by step workshop
items.headline: Watch me creating realistic botanical illustration in watercolor. I'll show you my secrets and provide with comments.
objectives_summary: Learn how to paint realistically;
Get to know techniques I use in watercolor botanical illustration;
Learn how to work with watercolor layers so that they stay transparent and clear;

items.title: Watercolor Course Paint this Window Seascape
items.headline: Project - Create a lovely Watercolor Painting your very first time. Step by step Artist guided Seascape Window scene.
objectives_summary: Complete this "Looking through the Window" Watercolor Scene step by step.
Creative Fun and enjoyment of watercolors. Learn what materials to use for basic watercolor
Learn to Sketch, use a light color wash, and add fine details on a seascape watercolor painting.

items.title: Creative Watercolours Beginners
items.headline: Be inspired with watercolours and learn how to create wonderful special texture effects in watercolour painting.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you will understand how to use several techniques in watercolour that allow you to get really creative with your paintings .
You will gain confidence in your creative ability.
You will be inspired to experiment more with your watercolours.

items.title: Rock Painting for Beginners
items.headline: Learn the Basics of this Fun Hobby!
objectives_summary: The ability to learn how to create beautiful rock art with confidence

items.title: The Importance of Thumbnail Sketching
items.headline: Draw and Explore Concepts More Effectively
objectives_summary: How to Improve Your Illustrations by Creating Good Thumbnails
Explore Ideas More Efficiently
Improve Your Drawing Abilities

items.title: Learn to juggle rhythms with Chuka Chuks
items.headline: There are hundreds of rhythms and grooves just waiting to be discovered, enjoy learning to catch the rhythms!
objectives_summary: You will learn to play solo, trade rhythms with friends and jam with musicians.

items.title: Watercolor painting with Master step-by-step: Poppy field

visible_instructors.job_title: Artist, creator of INSPAREA brand, finalist of TOYP2014
visible_instructors.name: Vitalii
visible_instructors.title: Vitalii Dets

items.headline: 3-steps lesson teaches you how to create a realistic watercolor landscape within 2 hours using professional techniques
objectives_summary: After easy 3-steps lesson you will be able to create your own watercolor landscape. 1. Consequence of applying watercolor techniques. 2. Which paints to mix for natural colors 3. How to correct any mistakes and make your painting vibrant.

items.title: How to make Creative Tassel Earrings and Lapel Pins
items.headline: Learn to make your own creative Tassel Earrings and lapel Pins
objectives_summary: At the end of the course students will be able to make their own Tassel Earrings
Students will have an indepth knowledge on how to use tools needed in making Tassel Earrings
Students will know the processes involved in making Tassel Earrings
